TextAsset.value: (Holding her hand like this... It's so nice.
But why does she want to go to the roof with meâ€¦ and alone?!)
(It's just that she's so flirtatious and I wonder how much she assumes... )
(And also... I can't control my imagination!)
Maybe we should go back downstairs and see what the others are up to...
(What... What's going to happen here?! I'm ... I'm not ready!)
What'd you think I was going to say?!
(What is this twinge? Is it... Disappointment?)
(She threw it at me! I barely caught it.)
(It... It's made of wood! I really think we should be using foam... It's much safer, you know.)
(Also, NOT sword-fighting is a lot safer than sword-fighting.)
(Valkyrie is looking down the blade and holding it kind of lightly... I think she's checking the balance? That's a sword thing, right?)
(Now she's doing all kinds of warm-ups? Sword warm-ups? I don't even know what they're called... )
(She threw it up into the air! It's spinning... Oh wow, she snatched it up before it hit the ground. How did she even know which end to catch?!)
Sometimes... You have to live in the moment, ${slot:playerName}. Give yourself to the present!
I'M FULL OF HESITATION! AND FEELINGS! SOMETIMES AN UNCOMFORTABLE MIX OF THE TWO!
ADOLESCENCE IS A HORRIFYING COCKTAIL OF HIGHS AND LOWS!
(SHE'S CHARGING! Which end do I hold?! I think it's backwards!)
(I DID IT! I blocked! AH, she's coming again!)
Step it up! I'm not even going all out!
WHAT IS YOUR DEFINITION OF FUN
Okay, I'm yelling a little bit. Valkyrie, I'm not very good at this!
Nonsense! You're starting to get the basics down.
The only thing I'm good at is rolling!
Is rolling what got you into detention?
I knew it! I was sure it was you I saw.
Dig Dug was pretty mad, but he was stuck to the outside of your Katamari so all he could do was flail his little arms and legs.
It was awesome! You ARE really good at rolling.
(Somehow... I'm a little happy that she saw me roll up all that stuff.
And she said it made her laugh... )
Hey, you're blushing! What're you thinking about!
Maybe it's time for me to go... On the offensive.)
Say, Valkyrie... Why are YOU in detention?
You're 1000 years too early to get me, ${slot:playerName}!
I tried to turn back the big school clock.
I love the 80s! And I thought that big clock could take me back!
What do you like so much about the 80s?
I just liked it okay?! It's the perfect decade!
You just seem really desperate to get back there...
It just seems like maybe there's a little more to it....
(Something hit me in the head? I think... I'm gonna take a nap....)
Oof... Hah. I'm not sure that applies here.
That's good. I'm sorryâ€¦ SMH. Sometimes I get into this, like... Sword fugue... And ...
It's okay. I have to say... You're pretty handy with a sword.
Is THAT what we were doing?
IDKâ€¦ I was if you were.
(We sit quietly for a while... Just looking at each other.)
Sorry... I like to play rough.
I could get used to it.
(Maybe it's because she clocked me, but...
(I don't have another word for it.
I thought she was cute at first... And she totally is...
But I really like how engaging she is. If she likes a person, she goes for it.
There are so many little things about her that make her her.)
(I want to learn all of them.)
(I really, really like her. Sitting here, with her, right now... I think my feelings for her are becoming clear.)
(She kissed me! On the cheek, but still... )
When you think that hard, you get a really cute look on your face.
Dig Dug came by while you were out... He sentenced us to Detention Level 99: Infinite Ragnarok Detention for fighting on the roof.
AH! Oh well... I guess I'll see you soon then, huh?
I know that's gonna be tough for you.
(We sit quietly until the bell rings. It's nice.)
